data.comment: The match has started.
At AFAS Stadion, Mamadou Fall has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 9, Goal! Mechelen have got their heads in front thanks to a Geoffry Hairemans strike.
Kaveh Rezaei equalizes with a header to make it 1-1.
Ryota Morioka with an assist there.
In the minute 32, Goal! Igor De Camargo gives Mechelen a 2-1 lead.
Great play from Geoffry Hairemans to set up the goal.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at AFAS Stadion.
Jordi Vanlerberghe blunders with an own goal. This makes it 2-2.
Siemen Voet (Mechelen) has received a yellow card from Bert Put.
In the minute 61, Mechelen's Steven Defour has been booked in Mechelen.
Marco Ilaimaharitra is booked for the away team.
Ali Gholizadeh scores to make it 2-3 at AFAS Stadion.
An attacking Mechelen player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
In the minute 82, Steeven Willems (Charleroi) has received a first yellow card.
Joachim Van Damme scores from the spot and Mechelen draw level at AFAS Stadion.
In the minute 84, The home team replace Geoffry Hairemans with Onur Kaya.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 3-3.
Mechelen make their second substitution with Rob Schoofs replacing Steven Defour.
Guillaume Gillet is replacing Shamar Nicholson for Charleroi at AFAS Stadion.
